Package algorithms.imageProcessing

package algorithms.imageProcessing
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    algorithms
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DistanceTransform
    Euclidean square distance transforms are computed for every zero pixel relative to a non-zero point.
    FFT
    adapted from Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, and Stein pseudocode first implemented in project https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations w/ Copyright (c) 2014 Climb With Your Feet and using The MIT License (MIT) then moved to this shared library project which has the same copyright and license.
    FFTUtil
    first implemented in project http://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations w/ Copyright (c) 2014 Climb With Your Feet and using The MIT License (MIT) then moved here to share with other projects.
    Filters
    first implemented in project https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations w/ Copyright (c) 2014 Climb With Your Feet and using The MIT License (MIT) then moved to this shared library project which has the same copyright and license.
    StatsInSlidingWindow
    class to calculate a running maximum of input in sliding window of size k.
    StatsInSlidingWindow.SortedVector
    a fixed size list that keeps the contents sorted after the capacity is reached.
    SummedAreaTable0
    An algorithm to make cumulative sums at a pixel adding to it the value from the pixel below and the value from left of it.
